articles.title: Henry Rollins: ‘I wouldn’t go back on stage with a band for anything’ - The Guardian
articles.description: The writer, actor and legendary punk musician answers your questions on working with William Shatner and Al Pacino, the joy of lifting weights and Leeds’ best onion bhajis
articles.content: As a music obsessive, why have you stepped back from making it? The GingerNinjaI stopped processing ideas in terms of lyrics. One day, I woke up and thought: Im done. My manager flipped out, but Ive … [+8792 chars]

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow ski trial: family expected to testify on effects of collision - The Guardian
articles.description: Daughters of Terry Sanderson, who is suing Paltrow, expected to detail brain damage following crash at upscale resort
articles.content: Two daughters of the retired optometrist who is suing Gwyneth Paltrow are expected to testify on Thursday about the lasting effects of their father and Paltrows 2016 ski collision, as the trial takes… [+1842 chars]

articles.title: Justin Roiland: Domestic violence charges against Rick and Morty creator dropped - BBC
articles.description: Justin Roiland says he is "thankful" but is "deeply shaken by the horrible lies that were reported".
articles.content:
US prosecutors have dropped domestic violence charges against Rick and Morty co-creator and voice actor Justin Roiland.
Charges involving an ex-girlfriend were dismissed "due to a lack of sufficient… [+1981 chars]
